Name: Pay Me In Colors
About the game: Pay Me In Colors is a 2D platformer game inspired by the classics of the past. The game is divided in 6 worlds, each one gives a different and challenging mechanic to explore, run through many levels and accept the challenge of giving the world colors again. Key features : 40+ levels. 6 worlds , each with a different mechanic to challenge you. Simple and responsive controls. Compatible with controllers.

Meta Description: Looking for information on Pay Me In Colors? Check out the release date (Jun 4, 2020), developer insights from 1UP Factory, and a complete game summary.
